cronTime.description:
Cron expression
second         0-59
minute         0-59
hour           0-23
day of month   1-31
month          1-12 (or names, see below)
day of week    0-7 (0 or 7 is Sunday, or use names)
cronTime.title: cronTime

baseUrl.description:
The base URL to use for all resources
If not set the baseUrl points to the draft version of the CDN
baseUrl.title: baseUrl

loaderFileName.description:
The name of the loader file to use
If not set the loader file is named 'dcupl.lc.json'
loaderFileName.title: loaderFileName

headers.description:
Custom Headers used for fetching the loader file
For example authorization headers
headers.title: headers

skipApply.description: If set to false the fetched config is not applied to the loader but only returned
skipApply.title: skipApply

items.description: A model describes a real world object and hols attributes.

key.description: The key is an unique identifier overall models in the application.

loaderConfig.description:
The base structure for configuration file contains all resources, evnironments and headers
The process options define how this file is processed

anyOf.description: A model describes a real world object of your applicatoin like a customer, a product or a sales order.
A data resource contains data for a model.
A transformer resource points to a javascript file that can be used to transform the data of a data resource.
A query operator resource points to a javascript file that defines a custom query operator.

The transformer type
rawFileTransformer: The transformer is applied to the raw file
parsedFileTransformer: The transformer is applied to the parsed file
